verbs.description: red sox [V: have] dealt with minimal adversity this season the red sox had their resilience tested this season to the greatest extent in june when they fell two games out of first place following back - to - back losses at minnesota rick porcello new york city boston red sox alex cora yankee stadium new york yankees red sox yankees
